text: A gubernatorial election was held on 8 September 2019 to elect the next Governor of Iwate. == Candidates == *Takuya Tasso*, backed by the opposition parties CDP, JCP, SDP, DPFP. *Atsushi Oikawa back by LDP and Komeito. He is a former local assemblyman for LDP. == Results == ==References== ==External links== Category:2019 elections in Japan Category:Gubernatorial elections in Japan Category:September 2019 events in Japan Category:Politics of Iwate Prefecture
title: 2019 Iwate gubernatorial election
